page.title: 20LIVING IN COLEHILL.
page.content:
I like living in Colehill because there are lots of play areas like Olivers Park. There is a little wood that we play in and lots of swings and a slide. There is Cannon Hill woods quite near where we live. Near the by-pass is a river. We go down there for a walk sometimes. We go to school at Hayeswood. It has one big play- ground and a big field. Colehill is a nice place for horse riding. Very near is Wimborne Minster. Lots of people go there. There are lots of fields around us that we play in and lots of friends live near. People keep many pets because the roads are not main roads. In Colehill, people have quite big gardens and nice houses.
DEBORAH HARVEY. AGED 8 YEARS.
